chapters.title: Chapter 26: Expectation
chapters.info: Bodewhin (Bode) Cauthon, p. 498 (577)—Mat's younger sister, age seventeen. She came with Verin and Alanna to become Aes Sedai. She has the spark inborn; she will channel whether she wants to or not. She is now a novice in the rebel Tower under Egwene. See also Cauthon, Matrim.
